title: Introduction to IMC PowerTool
slug: This Introduction to IMC PowerTool Learning Lab will guide you through the use of IMC PowerTool to connect to a UCS stand-alone server IMC, perform queries against IMC objects, change IMC settings and disconnect from the IMC. UCS IMC Objects are representations of BIOS settings, policies, disk configurations, other logical constructs and physical entities.

related.title: Introductory UCS IMC Redfish REST API
